description.html:
@hsu and I have been using the test_friction.world as an informal friction test, so I decided to add an official integration test for it.

The world involves several boxes on the ground plane with a reoriented gravity vector that simulates a 45 degree inclined plane. Each box has a coefficient of friction near 1.0. The boxes with a friction coefficient of 1.0 or greater should not slide, while the boxes with a friction coefficient less than 1.0 should slide. I wrote this test with expectations on the velocity value over 10 seconds of simulation.

Currently simbody does not pass the test (#989).

title: Add test based on test_friction.world

The boxes with a friction coefficient of 1.0 or greater should not slide, while the boxes with a friction coefficient less than 1.0 should slide. Currently simbody does not pass the test (#989).
